entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerland 12:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries and ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
